intro: Maloba oyo esalelaka mpo na ba commandes nyonso ya ba cours na internet na plateforme Excell-is-Hub App. Soki ozui cours, ozali koyokana na maloba oyo.

payment.content: Kofuta esalemi na internet na nzela ya s√©curit√©. Sim…õt…õ kofuta ek√≥mi, moteyi azwi nzela ya mbala moko ya cours.

delivery.content: Ba contenus nyonso (ba vid√©os, ba documents, ba quiz, n.k.) ezalaka na forme num√©rique mpe eyaka na esika na yo ya moto na plateforme.

withdrawal.content: Kolanda mibeko ya mboka, droit ya kolongola motema ezali te na contenus num√©riques oyo esalemaka mbala moko sima ya kofuta.

support.content: Soki ozali na pasi ya kokota na cours, yebisa biso na peji ya contact. Tokopesa eyano na ngonga 48 ya mosala.

footer.text: Soki ozali na mituna mpo na ba achats na yo to makoki na yo, tala peji na biso ya confidentialit√© to tinda biso message na contact.
